snippet: The encounter this month was a sign of the increased tensions in the South China Sea as China tries to enforce its territorial claims.
abstract: Navy vessels from United States and China almost collide in South China Sea when Chinese ship cuts across the bow of American cruiser; accident is averted when missile-carrying cruiser maneuvers to avoid Chinese vessel; encounter is sign of increased tensions between countries.
lead_paragraph: The encounter this month was a sign of the increased tensions in the South China Sea as China tries to enforce its territorial claims.

headline.main: American and Chinese Navy Ships Nearly Collided in South China Sea
headline.print_headline: American and Chinese Navy Ships Nearly Collided in South China Sea

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
